import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import '.Home.css'; const featuredProducts = [ { id: 1, name: 'Smartphone X', image: '/images/smartphone.jpg', price: '$499', description: 'Latest model with advanced features.', }, { id: 2, name: 'Laptop Y', image: '/images/laptop.jpg', price: '$899', description: 'High-performance laptop for work and gaming.', }, { id: 3, name: 'Smartwatch Z', image: '/images/smartwatch.jpg', price: '$199', description: 'Keep track of your health and notifications.', } ]; const productCategories = [ { name: 'Smartphones', image: '/images/smartphones.jpg' }, { name: 'Laptops', image: '/images/laptops.jpg' }, { name: 'Accessories', image: '/images/accessories.jpg' }, { name: 'Home Appliances', image: '/images/appliances.jpg' }, ]; const customerReviews = [ { customer: 'John Doe', review: 'Great quality products and fast delivery! Highly recommend this store.', rating: 5, }, { customer: 'Jane Smith', review: 'Amazing shopping experience! Found everything I needed.', rating: 4, }, ]; function Home() { return (
{/* Hero Banner */}

Welcome to the E-Commerce Store

Your one-stop shop for all things amazing!

{/* Featured Categories */}

Shop by Category

{productCategories.map((category, index) => (

{category.name}

))}
{/* Featured Products */}

Featured Products

{featuredProducts.map(product => (

{product.name}

{product.description}

{product.price}
))}
{/* Customer Reviews */}

What Our Customers Say

{customerReviews.map((review, index) => (

{review.customer}

{review.review}

{'★'.repeat(review.rating)}{' '} {'☆'.repeat(5 - review.rating)}
))}
{/* Promotions */}

Exclusive Offers

Buy 1 Get 1 Free!

On select products, only this week!

Up to 50% Off!

Get massive discounts on best-selling items.

{/* Newsletter Subscription */}

Subscribe to Our Newsletter

Get the latest updates and exclusive offers right in your inbox!

); } export default Home;
